document_data.name: Hourm
document_data.mainbody: '''Hourm''' was a friendly [[galeb duhr]] living in [[Gravenhollow]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Hourm assisted an expedition led by some [[adventurer]]s who'd been hired by [[Bruenor Battlehammer]] to investigate the threat of a [[demon lord]]. Hourm explained to them the functions and rules of the library. After he finished his task, he remerged with a wall.
